name: Trijam #187 - Stay Here Forever
description:
Stay Here Forever - 2hrs 41min - 25/9/2022 - Solo Dev

This is my submission to Trijam #187 which is a 3 hour game jam where you're given a theme and very little time. 

I had an absolute blast building this game and learnt a ton about myself as a developer and the constrictions within a three hour time period. On this project I focused heavily on improving my 2D game design and actually finishing a game jam. I love the way my camera controller turned out and I think the game would become a really polished small gem if I had another 6 hours. 

There actually is a way to escape however its outside the viewable area as I must have built this project wrong. If you move your player to the top left corner you should be able to see a button you can press and you can complete the game from there. Of course if more time permitted I would fix this bug and expand on the game but hey... we only had 3 hours.
